Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Holy crap! Are you okay? You look pale as milk!
<PAGE>
Maybe you should take today off from work.
C'mon, I'll take you to the clinic.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, Doc! Is <MYNAME> gonna be okay?! It's
not some life-threatening disease, is it? C'mon,
tell me something, old man!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Goodness! Calm down, would you honey?
...And if you call me "old man" again, I'll give
you the biggest, most painful shot I have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But anyway, hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60
days</BLUE> left until the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Goodness! Calm down, would you honey?
...And if you call me "old man" again, I'll give
you the biggest, most painful shot I have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But anyway, hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40
days</BLUE> left until the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Goodness! Calm down, would you honey?
...And if you call me "old man" again, I'll give
you the biggest, most painful shot I have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But anyway, hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30
days</BLUE> left until the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, honey. You're pregnant. You've
got a little baby growing right there in your
tummy.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_R>Oh, so it's just a bab--WAIT, IT'S A BABY?! Th-
then <MYNAME> wasn't feeling sick because
she had a cold...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, she's
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it's not a life-threatening disease, honey.
You can relax.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
O-oh...Th-that's good, at least. So...we're gonna
have a new family member soon. Heh heh! Man,
I'm stoked!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
Fritz, as her husband, I want you to keep an eye
on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right! <MYNAME>, you're feeling okay, right? If
you're starting to feel tired or hurt or anything,
tell me right away, okay?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Still...we're gonna be parents! Man, it's a HUGE
surprise, but it's so cool!
<PAGE>
I'd better step up my game and work harder if
I'm gonna be a proper papa for our new baby.
Yeah, we can do this! Bring it on!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong? You look very pale today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Take the day off from work. You're in no
condition for it. Come. I'll take you to the clinic.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Marian, how is <MYNAME> doing? Is it some
sort of virus?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eh?! A.........b-baby? Then, <MYNAME> was
feeling unwell because of...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, she's
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it's not a virus of any kind. You can relax.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A baby... Well now. We're going to have a
baby... O-okay...a baby...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
Klaus, as her husband, I want you to keep an
eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you feeling a little better? I
want you to tell me the minute you start feeling
out of sorts, all right?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
We are going to be parents. It is all so sudden
that it doesn't yet feel real to me, but still, it
makes me very happy.
<PAGE>
I guess I'm going to have to work harder so that
I can be a fit father for our child. I can hardly
wait for the day it is born.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa there, <MYNAME> what's wrong?! You
look as pale as a sheet!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I think you should take today off from work.
C'mon, I'll take you to the clinic.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Doc Marian, how's <MYNAME> doing? She
hasn't caught some kind of nasty flu or
anything, right?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wait, what? Baby? Like, a BABY baby?
...<MYNAME> is going to have a baby...?
Hooooo boy...
<PAGE>
Then, she wasn't feeling sick because she had
the flu. It's because...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, she's
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it's not the flu. You can relax.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
O-oh...w-we're going to have a new family
member soon... Wow, that's fantastic.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
Raeger, as her husband, I want you to keep an
eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you feeling okay? If you ever
start feeling tired or drained, let me know right
away. Got it?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Still...a baby. It's all so sudden it hasn't really
sunk in yet, but I think we're at the start of
something great.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Guess I'm gonna have to start working even
harder so I can be a cool dad for our little squirt.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>? You look terribly
pale.
<PAGE>
I think you ought to take today off from work
and go straight to the clinic. Come, I'll go with
you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Doctor Marian, how is <MYNAME>? I fear she's
come down with something awful.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, did you just say "baby"? Really?
.........Well. Th-then I suppose it was no illness
that <MYNAME> was experiencing...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, she's
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it's not some strange ailment. You can
relax.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I...see. We're going to have a baby. W-well now.
A baby...I see...
<PAGE>
It's all quite overwhelming, but this is news of
the happiest sort.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
Mistel, as her husband, I want you to keep an
eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you feeling all right now, <MYNAME>? Like
Doctor Marian said, you mustn't push yourself.
<PAGE>
If you start feeling even the slightest bit out of
sorts, let me know right away.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
It hasn't yet sunk all the way in, but...we are
going to be parents. What a wonderful surprise.
I'm looking forward to it.
<PAGE>
I shall have to start working even harder, I think,
so that I can prove a worthy father for our child.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's wrong, <MYNAME>? You don't look so
hot today.
<PAGE>
In fact...cancel your work plans for the day. I'm
taking you to the clinic right now.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Marian, how's <MYNAME> doing? I've seen
symptoms like these, with parasites...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's just a baby......HOLD ON, WHAT DID YOU
JUST SAY?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_R><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME> is p-p-pr-prr...is gonna have a b-b-
baby?! Th-then she wasn't feeling bad 'cause of
a parasite...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, she's
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
And no, I don't think babies qualify as parasites.
You can relax.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A...A baby... So that's it...We're gonna have a
baby... That's...that's pretty wild.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
Nadi, as her husband, I want you to keep an eye
on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You feelin' okay? No pushing it, got it? And be
sure to tell me the second you feel bad, all
right?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow... I-it still doesn't feel real to me, but we're
gonna be parents. That's pretty awesome.
<PAGE>
Guess I'm gonna to have to step it up so I can
be a good dad for our new baby. Can't wait 'til
it's born!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whoa, whoa, whoa, are you all right? You aren't
looking too spry, there.
<PAGE>
Maybe you should take the day off work today.
In fact...come on, I'm taking you to the clinic.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Doctor Marian, how is <MYNAME> doing? It's
not something bad like the flu, is it?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What? A b-b-b-baby?! Th-then she wasn't
feeling bad because she was sick, it's--
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, she's
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it's not some kind of viral illness. You
can relax.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whew. I'm glad to know you aren't three steps
from vomit-town, but wow...a baby? We're
really going to have a baby? I can't believe it!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
Kamil, as her husband, I want you to keep an
eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You feeling all right? Let me know if you start
feeling wiped out or nauseous. I'll do whatever I
can to help.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I can still hardly believe it. We're going to have a
new family member... I don't know if I've ever
been this happy in my life.
<PAGE>
I guess I'm going to have to work a lot harder
now, so I can be a great dad for our new little
one. I can hardly wait.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Er, <MYNAME>...?
<PAGE>
There have been a few times lately when I've felt
out of sorts, but this morning I feel particularly
unwell.
<PAGE>
I think I ought to visit the clinic...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Doctor Marian, please tell me. What kind of
illness do I have?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
A b-b-baby...? I'm pregnant?! Then...the reason
I've been feeling unwell recently has been...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, you're
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it isn't a virus of any kind. You can relax.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I...I'm pregnant. A little baby is growing inside
me right now...! How wonderful!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, as her husband, I want you to keep
an eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that Doctor Marian has examined
everything, I am feeling much better.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you for escorting me to the clinic,
<MYNAME>,

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...I'm pregnant. I am still having trouble getting
over my surprise at that fact. But...it makes me
very happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I guess I shall have to take very good care of
myself for the foreseeable future, so as to help
our baby stay healthy.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh dear. <MYNAME>, did I wake you? I'm sorry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I haven't been feeling well for several days now,
but this morning it's especially bad. I think I
should go to the clinic today.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Doctor Marian, what's wrong with me? I don't
have some sort of bacterial infection, do I?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A baby...? I'm going to have a baby...?! Then,
the reason I haven't been feeling well is...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, you're
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it's not a bacterial infection. You can
relax.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
O-oh my goodness...! I...I'm pregnant! We're
going to have a baby! I'm so happy!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, as her husband, I want you to keep
an eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that Doctor Marian has had a chance to
examine me, I'm feeling much better.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you for seeing me to the clinic today,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a wonderful surprise. We're going to have a
baby. I wonder if it'll be a boy or a girl. We
should start thinking about names!
<PAGE>
I can hardly wait to find out. I'll have to take
good care of myself, so our baby can be as
healthy as possible.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
Sorry. I haven't been feeling so good lately. This
morning it's been really bad, so I was thinking
maybe I should go to the clinic.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Doctor Marian, am I sick? Did I catch the flu or
something?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A b-b-b-baby?! I'm p-pregnant?! Then...th-the
reason I haven't been feeling good is...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, you're
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, you don't have the flu. You can relax.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Wow...I-I'm pregnant. There's a little baby
growing in my tummy right now...! Ohmigosh,
that is so amazing!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, as her husband, I want you to keep
an eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now that the doctor's looked at me, I'm feeling
lots better.
<PAGE>
Thanks for coming with me to the clinic today,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
We're going to have a baby...! It's so surprising it
still feels unreal. But I'm so happy!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm going to have to talk with my boss and see if
I can get some time off work. I don't want to
overdo anything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh geez, now the adrenaline is starting to kick
in. I can hardly wait for our new family member
to be born!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I feel really icky this morning. If I have a cold, I
don't want you getting sick, too. Maybe I should
head down to the clinic.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Um, Doctor...? Do I have a cold?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT>
A...b-b-baby? I'm pregnant...?! Then...the
reason I've felt so icky is because...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, you're
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, you're 100% cold-free. You can relax.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yay! I don't even know what to say. This is so
great!
<PAGE>
It's wonderful to know we're going to have a
baby together.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, as her husband, I want you to keep
an eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heeheehee! There's a little baby in my tummy
right now! That's such a wonderful surprise, it
made all the icky feelings go away. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want to have lots and lots of children, so I'd be
really happy if I could have a whole litter at
once, just like puppies!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But...I don't think that'd work. So I'll be happy
with one baby, too.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah...<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I feel really unwell this morning. I thought I
might go to work early and talk to the doctor
about what it might be.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT>
Doctor, what is the diagnosis? There are several
different viruses I am aware of that could cause
these symptoms.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>60 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>40 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...I'd say you have about <BLUE>30 days</BLUE> left until
the baby is born.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A...baby? I'm pregnant...? Then...these
symptoms aren't an illness, they're...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Right. It's simple morning sickness, which is
common in early pregnancy. Otherwise, you're
perfectly healthy.
<PAGE>
So no, it's not a viral or bacterial illness, or
anything on your list of suspicions. You can
relax.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It feels so strange to say it, but...I'm pregnant.
We're going to have a baby. That is truly
wonderful, wonderful news...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so happy for you, honey. But listen to your
body now, okay? No overdoing it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it probably doesn't feel real to you just
yet, but your body isn't yours alone for the time
being. Remember that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, as her husband, I want you to keep
an eye on her condition too, okay?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you for accompanying me
today.
<PAGE>
Now that the doctor has examined me, I'm
feeling much better. You needn't worry so much
now.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Still...this all still feels somewhat surreal. But it
isn't, is it. We really are going to have a baby.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I guess I shall have to pay special attention to
my health and nutrition not just for myself, but
for our baby, too.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Aah, <MYNAME>. Did I wake you?
<PAGE>
